text: Yet I am the Lord your God who brought you out of the land of Egypt. You shall know13:4. A variation of the Ten Commandments with “know” replacing “have” (Exodus 20:3). This change is significant in that the word “know” carries overtones of intimate relations, and can be linked to the erotic nature of Baal worship. Israel should not be “knowing” Baal but the true God. no other gods but me. None can save you except me.
